name: Secrets of Orion: Sword of Destiny.
name_original: Secrets of Orion: Sword of Destiny.
description:
Unravel the mystery behind the death of the king of Orion alongside Royolt, the king's former bodyguard, who returns to the continent to investigate a mystery from the past and find his former allies in a 2d platform action adventure of the metroidvania genre with puzzles , combats and different endings.


Explore a vast continent with forests, icy mountains, caves and cities full of stories and treasures
Various weapons and equipment
Create your ending according to your actions
Find gems and enchantments for your weapons
Discover the backstory of the characters in sidequests and secret maps
Face over 50 enemy types
Solve various side quests
